{"id":492181566,"lang":"java","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1620823494,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/492181566/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"38.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String makeGood(String s) {\n         for(int i=0;i<s.length()-1;i++)\n         {\n             if(s.charAt(i)+32==s.charAt(i+1)  || s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(i+1)+32)\n             {\n                 return makeGood(s.substring(0,i)+s.substring(i+2));\n             }\n         }\n        return s;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great"}
